00052      * struct to hold the callback information
00053      */
00054     struct axis2_callback_info
00055     {
00056         const axutil_env_t *env;
00057         void *in_stream;
00058         int content_length;
00059         int unread_len;
00060         axis2_http_chunked_stream_t *chunked_stream;
00061     };
00062     typedef struct axis2_callback_info axis2_callback_info_t;
